page.title: 15LOCAL GOVERNMENT-PARISH
page.content: {Mr. .BOXALL is Clerk to the Council . This is a part-time post and Mr.Boxall was appointed after replying to a local advertisement.His job is to prepare information for the Council meetings and to offer advice so that the Councillors can make good desisions. This means that he must write some 30-40 letters each month. In his spare time Mr Boxall is building a garage. {Lots of things concern St.Merryn {Parish Council}such as litter,looking after the recreation grounds and toilets,cutting hedges and trees, laying new roads ,decorating and painting Parish buildings,making things better generally. {The council owns}the playing fields and Towan Green and pond.
